name: Shape Story
description:
Fight fair and square in this Boss Rush styled Game! :D

How To Play

Arrows to move around and jump, Z to use your Push Ability, E to use your special attack (Changes for each Character) and space to start!

The Story

Four shapes are wandering around, searching for an exciting adventure.

But suddenly, they're agressed by an ennemy shape...

They'll have to use their Push Ability to fight them!

Other Random Things

Maybe I'll make a better version, which will be downloadable and with more features. While waiting just play this one ^^'

This was made in one week-end for the 12th Mini Jam, hope you enjoy!
